p: Participant 13 discusses Christian life, filled with hope, support and love for each other. The participant discusses the help she received from her church to go through difficult periods of her life. She established a connection with God and used this connection to facilitate her wellness. The participant discusses her Christian faith, such as going to church, praying, supporting those in need and believing in God’s love. Note the frequency of her use of the word “God” or “He” in the following quote. It is clear this person believes in the miraculous powers of God, who is the center of her universe.
